short_summary: SUPPLY ARRANGEMENT - W8485-184741 SERIES - AVIATION REPLACEMENT PARTS
description: THIS REQUIREMENT IS TO ACQUIRE 3 ITEMS FOR THE CT114 TUTOR FOR THE DEPARTMENT OF NATIONAL DEFENCE (DND), DIRECTORATE OF AEROSPACE PROCUREMENT (DAP) 5. THIS REQUEST FOR PROPOSAL (RFP) IS OPEN ONLY TO QUALIFIED SUPPLY ARRANGEMENT (SA) HOLDERS OF SUPPLY ARRANGEMENT W8485-184741 SERIES...
full_summary:
## Supply Arrangement W8485-184741 – Aviation Replacement Parts

### Notice Type: Request for Proposal (RFP)

The Department of National Defence (DND) invites qualified Supply Arrangement (SA) holders to submit a proposal for the procurement of replacement parts for the CT114 Tutor aircraft.

#### Brief Description
This RFP is open to pre-qualified SA holders who have been invited to bid on this requirement. The procurement is a competitive, selective tendering process.

#### Key Requirements
* Replacement parts for the CT114 Tutor aircraft
* Procurement under Supply Arrangement W8485-184741 series
* Request for Proposal (RFP) documents will be emailed directly to invited SA holders

#### Qualifying Suppliers
The following companies have been invited to submit a proposal:

| Supplier | Company Name |
| --- | --- |
| 1 | Aero Precision Industries LLC |
| 2 | Aero Technical Components Inc. |
| 3 | B S F (Business Solutions Fasteners) International Inc. |
| 4 | Patlon Aircraft & Industries Limited |
| 5 | Tronosjet Maintenance Inc. |
| 6 | Tulmar Safety |
| 7 | M1 Composites Technology |
| 8 | Mattis Aerospace |
| 9 | Rockwell Collins Canada |
| 10 | TSL Aerospace Technologies |

#### Contact Information
For any inquiries, please contact:
Aerospace Equipment Program Management (DGAEPM)
Department of National Defence (DND)/ Government of Canada
455, Boulvard de la carrière, Gatineau (QC) J8Y 6V7
Steve Duval
steve.duvalurbain@forces.gc.ca
Phone: (613) 292-9650

#### Submission Guidelines
Proposal documents will be distributed via email to invited SA holders. The Government Electronics Tendering System (GETS) is not responsible for the distribution of RFP documents.

Note: The RFP notice has expired and is no longer accepting proposals. The RFP status is Expiré/French: Expiré. 
#### Important Dates
* Publication Date: 2023-12-21
* Tender Closing Date: 2024-01-08T14:00:00 (expired)
* Expected Contract Start Date: 2024-01-08
* Expected Contract End Date: 2024-03-31

#### Classification
This procurement falls under the UNSPSC Classification Code: *46151607 – Security L
